Player

Class MusicHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player.MusicHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MusicHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    MusicHandler class, this launches and controls a thread that acts as the main music player.
    Author:
    Group 25

      • play

        public void play()
          throws javazoom.jl.decoder.JavaLayerException
        Starts playback (resumes if paused).
        Throws:
        javazoom.jl.decoder.JavaLayerException - On player failure.

      • pause

        public boolean pause()
        Pauses playback. Returns true if new state is PAUSED.
        Returns:
        True if the new state is PAUSED, False if something got boned up.

      • resume

        public boolean resume()
        Resumes playback.
        Returns:
        True if the new state is PLAYING, False if something got boned.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops playback. If not playing, does nothing.

      • playInternal

        private void playInternal()
        Makes sure the player is ready to begin playback.

        Closes the player, regardless of current state.
